name: Woeful Whisp
description:
A 2D platformer featuring a woeful whisp's futile attempts to die in order to please Mr.Death

CONTROLS

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Jump - W

Now that you have your controls. Die as much as possible!

Credits:

Sound - Coatedpolecat

Art - SheepishGamer

Level Design - Nakayuma

Programming - LESkidd113
